column5: Hi all. Looking for any suggestions for winter trout fishing with a 9 year old. i was thinking to try local in the Credit or Bronte as it's relatively safer and closer for public access. I've never been out in the winter and with my son safety is the first priority. Not looking for any private spots, but just general areas with good access. Also appreciate any suggestions for kids waders. Thanks all!

Most folks aren't too quick to give out trout spots. I would suggest using Fish-on line to find trout lakes in your vicinity and work from there. https://www.lioapplications.lrc.gov.on.ca/fishonline/Index.html?viewer=FishONLine.FishONLine&locale=en-CA
